cmp: 乙 ("B" (in a sequence of examples involving "A", "B", "C", etc.)/2nd heavenly stem/2nd in order)

faculty of memory, ability to remember
Sandy Lam (1966-), Hong Kong pop singer
to remain fresh in one's memory (idiom)
to view one's past as miserable and one's present as happy (idiom)
Remembering my brothers in faraway Shandong on the double ninth festival (poem by Tang Wang Wei's 王維|王维)
